ygData.msgSnippet: Fracturcon s calculations are faulty, if he killed a Human it could effect the timeline.  For all he knows a human he kills could be the ancestor of someone

Fracturcon's calculations are faulty, if he killed a Human it could effect 
the timeline.  For all he knows a human he kills could be the ancestor of 
someone like Genghis Khan, or Marco Polo.  Or Louis Pasteur!  A computer 
can't calculate, unless you got blood samples of every primitive human, and 
of all the important people in Earth's history!
